Smell Description: Task violates idempotency because it executes a command.
Task did not check the correctness of execution.
Task violates idempotency because it installs or upgrades packages with apt.
The installed package could become outdated because the script does not update it.
Task assumes the operating system family.
Task violates idempotency because it installs or upgrades packages with yum.
The installed package could become outdated because the script does not update it.
Task assumes the operating system family.
Task violates idempotency because it executes a command.
Task assumes the operating system family.
